body_html: Yeah the device arch is not backward compatible. You have to put every compute capability in TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST. However, I think we automatically capability of all available GPUs... We should fix it if we are not. And yes, a better error will be great.
body_text: Yeah the device arch is not backward compatible. You have to put every compute capability in TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST. However, I think we automatically capability of all available GPUs... We should fix it if we are not. And yes, a better error will be great.
body: Yeah the device arch is not backward compatible. You have to put every compute capability in `TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST`. However, I think we automatically capability of all available GPUs... We should fix it if we are not. And yes, a better error will be great.
